game.name: Rbots
game.description:
If you somehow feels likeness towards the physics and especially magnetism than this is one of the best adventure games online for the science lover and gamers. In a fun filled science game, it is an exciting free online adventure games for boys and gamers of all age groups.

Based upon one button control game, here, you are left with duty to match the somehow detached heads of the robots with their bodies after successfully passing all the levels of this running adventure games to play online. Like your favourite star war movies where magnetism and gravity control most of the game, here, too controls the way to the detached dancing bodies of the rolling robot heads.

At one of the top adventure games online, the spark of the magnetic field is clearly visible both at the rolling boll and along the magnet fixed at the path pulling the ball forward. You merely here have been tasked to escape the hurdles obstructing the path of rolling balls. The most perturbing hurdle on the path of this adventure game online is the spikes. Collecting the gold nuts on the play helps to pull up the energy level of rolling heads while countering and defending the enemies.

The control of this cool adventure game online is so simple and easy that you need only to have mouse or the spacebar of your key board to control the robot heads.
